author: Kimberly (Stylish Sidekick)
title: Walmart.com: Sharpie Permanent Markers 30-Pack Only $10 + Bonus Coloring Pages
text:
Hop on over to Walmart.com where you can score a 30-count pack of assorted Sharpie Permanent Markers (includes 15 fine point and 15 ultra-fine point) for just $10. Plus, this pack comes with bonus coloring pages!
Choose free in-store pick up if available near you; otherwise, score FREE 2-day shipping on any eligible $35+ order or pay $5.99 for shipping for orders under $35.
More Sharpie & EXPO deals this wayâ€¦
